turns.content: We just created REPO_TRUTH.md as a 'single source of truth' consolidation document. But we're in a CUTTING phase after BULKING. Is adding another tracking document the right move, or are we adding to sprawl? Consider: we already have CURRENT_CONCERNS.md, OPEN_CONCERNS.md, PATH_FORWARD.md, PRIORITY_MATRIX.md, ROADMAP.yaml. Should REPO_TRUTH.md exist, or should we DELETE it and update existing docs instead?
